import React from 'react'; import { NavLink } from 'react-router-dom'; import NavBar from '../NavBar/NavBar'; import profile from '../Icons/profile.jpg'; import s from './FAQ.module.css'; import linkedin from '../Icons/linkedin.png'; import github from '../Icons/github.png'; export default function About() { return (

Contact

Hi everybody! My name is Joaqu√≠n Gioffre. Welcome to my first project üöÄ



In this opportunity, I'm bringing to you my idea of what I think a leading videogame platform should be. I hope you enjoy testing it as much as I enjoyed developing it üòÅ



I would really appreciate any suggestions and feedback to keep improving the app üôèüèº



Enjoy your gaming!

What is Ki Games?

Ki Games is a prototype of a leading videogame database platform where we combine not only videogames of the world most popular companies but also we want to give you the opportunity to be a part of this universe and promove your own videogames.

What can I do here?

You can search video games by name, filter them by more than one genre and platform, and combine them with each other.

And what if I sign up?

You can show your talent to the world and upload your own videogames to be ranked by the community and have the opportunity to become popular.

How can I contribute to Ki Games?

Just contact me and give me your feedback about the site!

) }
